Uses of Interface
com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Channel

  • Packages that use Channel 
    Package Description
    com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport
    UPA Transport API package provides classes and interfaces for distributing messages across a TCP/IP based reliable network including Transport, Channel and Server.

    • Uses of Channel in com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport

      Methods in com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport that return Channel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Channel Server.accept(AcceptOptions opts, Error error)
      Accepts an incoming connection and returns a channel which corresponds to it.
      Typical use:
      After a server is created using the Bind call, the Accept call can be made.
      Channel Error.channel()
      The Channel the error occurred on.
      Channel Protocol.channel(AcceptOptions options, Server server, java.lang.Object object) 
      Channel Protocol.channel(ConnectOptions opts, Error error) 
      static Channel Transport.connect(ConnectOptions opts, Error error)
      Initialize transport defined in opts if not initialized.
      Connects a client to a listening server.
      1.
